DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether long term use experimental Vascular Wrap ( TM ) Paclitaxel-Eluting Mesh safe treatment subject need hemodialysis access ( via expand polytetrafluoroethylene ( ePTFE ) graft ) .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study Vascular Wrap Paclitaxel-Eluting Mesh Hemodialysis Vascular Access
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study determine long term safety Lifespan® ePTFE Vascular Graft Vascular Wrap ( TM ) Paclitaxel-Eluting Mesh comparison Lifespan® graft alone .
DOC.criteria: To consider enrollment , subject must : randomize protocol 012VWAV06 ; sign date IRBapproved write informed consent participate 012VWAV06 well study ; willing comply aspect evaluation schedule period 60 month post device insertion ; allow representative sponsor , designate Clinical Research Organization ( CRO ) , Institutional Review Board ( IRB ) , Ethics Committee , U.S. Food Drug Administration ( FDA ) review his/her relevant medical record . Subjects withdraw withdrawn study 012VWAV06 .
